name: Kids Cooking Snow Cone Maker
description:
Snow cones are the perfect hot summer dessert. Create ice dessert to chill out in summer season. Sit back and relax this summer with snow cone maker. Those who crave for yummy and icy snow cones to fulfill their sweet tooth will love making their own snow cone.

First you have to pour the ice into the ice shaving machine, then you crush the ice until its really fine and powder like.

Once your shaved ice is ready, you choose one of the many decorated cones. When you're happy with your cone, you can start scooping your ice. All you have to do now is shape your ice to get the snow cone of your dreams.

Now, get to the most wonderful step. Add your favorite snow cone flavors. You won't believe that you can make your own rainbow flavors. Just need to mix the flavors together, the magic flavor will be ready. Amazing...

So what are you waiting for...Start making snow cones today!
***** GAME FEATURES *****
* Best Desert for Summer Season
* Multiple Toppings for Decoration
* Blends Ice, Mix flavors & Add Toppings
* Free Recipe for Making Snow Cones
